title: Sentry Integration with Breadcrumbs
description: Set up Sentry for error tracking with navigation breadcrumbs.
instructions:
Create a main.dart that:

1. Initializes Sentry with SentryFlutter.init()
2. Reads the DSN from environment (SENTRY_DSN)
3. Sets the environment from ENVIRONMENT variable
4. Configures traces sample rate to 20%
5. Creates a MaterialApp with SentryNavigatorObserver for automatic navigation breadcrumbs
6. Includes a custom AppBreadcrumbs class with logUserAction() and logApiCall() methods

hints.text: SentryFlutter.init() takes an options callback and an appRunner callback
SentryNavigatorObserver automatically logs navigation as breadcrumbs
Use Sentry.addBreadcrumb() with a Breadcrumb object containing message, category, and data

commonMistakes.consequence: App starts before Sentry is initialized, missing early errors
commonMistakes.correction: Always use appRunner: () => runApp(MyApp()) in SentryFlutter.init()

commonMistakes.consequence: Navigation breadcrumbs are not captured automatically
commonMistakes.correction: Add SentryNavigatorObserver() to MaterialApp's navigatorObservers list
